name: Square Off - Chess App
description:
Enjoy chess as you never did and connect with anybody in the world on a real board through the Square Off app. The app lets you connect to an ever-increasing Square Off online community with video calls and chat while you enjoy your game of chess. Learn from your games by analyzing every move in a beautiful post game analyzer interface.
You can also earn real world rewards by winning games with AI and online players.
Things that make Square Off Awesome:
- Friend list
- Restrict history games and video calls to only friends
- Challenge for a game from chat
- Video call from chat
- New overlay design
- 20 levels of AI also with an adaptive mode
- Play online with a million users from the Square Off and chess.com community
- Video calling & chat to stay connected
- Post game analysis with a graphical interface
- Redeem coins for real world rewards
- Live stream tournaments
- Hints, threats and undo in AI games to help you learn new skills
- Achievements to unlock rewards
- Access your history games for review and analysis
- Connect to any Square Off board for a magical chess experience
Note: Though this app focuses on enhancing your experience with the Square Off boards is also an excellent stand-alone app for playing and learning chess
Know more about us at squareoffnow.com
